2.0: Tosafot on Ketubot 2a:1 says "בתולה is not taught with a hei... since in that case the mishnah would have to say ha-ʿeved ha-ʿivri (the Hebrew slave) which is not in construct form..." If it were in construct form it would mean 'the slave of a Hebrew,' but it is not in construct form, since it is about a slave who is a Hebrew. And if it was written ha-ʿeved ʿivri its meaning would be in construct form, so an additional hei has to be added to make ha-ʿivri so as to be understood that it is not in construct form. "And it is not the way of..." as was taught.
